Description of incident: Someone stole thousands of X-rays from Saint Jospeh medical Center.  Authorities believe the X-rays were taken for their silver content rather than for identity theft purposes. They contained patient names, dates of birth, medical record numbers, dates of service, physicians, and some diagnostic information.  Patients who were X-rayed between 2004 and 2005, as well as sometime during 2007 may have been affected.
